text: Atarkaval"ninkal evar campantamaka ennai nintittirlo, avartam ivar; niccayamaka nan avarai en viruppattirku inankumpati varpuruttinen - anal avar (mana urutiyutan) tam'maik kattuk kontar. Iniyum avar nan itum kattalaikkinanki natantu kollavittal ciraiyil tallappatuvar; melum avar cirumai ataintavarkalil oruvarakavum akivituvar" enru connal
